events.name: Overview of the Chef Automate platform
events.description: Atul Srivastava from Chef will be joining PowerShell Conference and will kindly be running a pre-conference community meeting to talk about the Chef Automate platform. Join us to learn more about Chef!
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, Meeting Room

events.name: PowerShell Advanced Tips and Tricks
events.description: PowerShell Tips & Tricks Following the PowerShell for Beginners workshop by Jason Yoder during the day, Jason Yoder will team up with Jaap Brasser to give insight in some of the interesting uses of PowerShell. During this session they will guide through some common pitfalls, interesting behavior and quirky tricks. This will both increase your PowerShell efficiency as well as allow to use PowerShell in new ways. The topics covered in this sessions range to basic to intermediate so there is something for everyone. If you are interested in learning more about PowerShell or if you would like to interact with two prominent experts in the field of PowerShell this is your chance. For one lucky attendee the PowerShell Conference Asia has provided us with a free ticket to attend the event on Saturday 22nd of October. <a href="http://psconf.asia"></a>
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, Meeting Room

events.name: WordPress Meetup (October 2016)
events.description:
Lightning Talk: Introduction to Global WordPress Translation Day (https://wptranslationday.org/)Robert Sim, WordPress Translation Volunteer Myths, Facts, Tips and Tricks Using Google AnalyticsGaurav Gupta, Digital Marketing Manager, Circles.Life Community Open Space: Please comment (below) on topics you would like to discuss, experts & enthusiasts present will answer questions. This will be casual. Possible topics could be - • What makes a good theme??  • My site loads slow, how do I make it faster?  • And more (just comment)  


Are you interested in sharing something about WordPress as well? Let us know!  


Do join us from 7pm for a 7:30pm start. Please call Jon at[masked] if you have an issue getting to the meetup. Do not abuse the number please :) We're always looking for speakers and volunteers to help with our meetups! Please contact Valentine, Jon or Robert if you're interested in helping out.
events.location: SkyScanner Ltd, 39 Robinson Road #09-01 Robinson Point, Singapore

events.name: Open Space @ Palo IT Innovation Studio (Agile Games)
events.description:
Open Space Facilitator: Marcelo & Rohit Open Space Theme: Agile Games We all know that games are fun and that humans are hard-wired to play. So, let's come together and share some Agile games that can get us out of our chairs, move the body and get some blood up to our brains. Agenda 7:00pm - Networking and food 7:30pm - Topic generation 8:00pm - Breakout sessions 10:00pm - End We welcome contributions of drinks and snacks! =) 


What is Open Space? Open Space is a highly collaborative and self-organised meeting where topics are generated on the spot and discussed by the participants through breakout sessions. For more information read Open Space Technology.

events.name: Singapore MusicTech - October Meetup
events.description: Venue: Avenue Cafe Talks:  PD Workshop & Discussion by Tommy Roberson Please bring your laptops and headphones. More info on Pure Data - https://puredata.info
events.location: Avenue Cafe, 454 Joo Chiat Rd, Singapore
